text: ABBA Voyage is a concert event in London. The shows uses technology to create computer-generated versions of the members of ABBA who perform their songs. Visual effects are used to show projections of people who look like the members of ABBA, as they are doing a music performance. It began in May 2022 and is due to end in November 2024. ==Sources== Category:ABBA
title: ABBA Voyage
